title: PT. Satnusa Persada Tbk
subtitle: Kapasitas Process Project
description: Comprehensive wastewater treatment capacity project including tank systems and electrical installations.
fullDescription: PT Toolmate Technologies Indonesia executed a major capacity process project for PT. Satnusa Persada Tbk at Pelita-Batam. The project encompassed installation of large-scale water tanks, treatment systems, electrical control panels, and associated civil works to enhance the facility's wastewater processing capabilities.
scope: Large water tank installation (100,000 Ltr capacity)
